description: This file declares functions related to 'constraints' handling in an icrule system, including freeing constraints and parsing constraint XML nodes. It also includes relevant headers and licensing information.

methods.name: icrule_free_constraint
methods.description: Frees a constraint object allocated in the system.

methods.name: icrule_parse_constraint
methods.description: Parses an XML node to extract constraints and add them to a constraints list based on specified logic.
